insert into stock (numstr, innumber, nownumber, flag, `operator`, createtime, filed1, filed2, filed3, filed4, filed5) values (#{numstr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{innumber,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{nownumber,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{flag,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{operator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{filed1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{filed2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{filed3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{filed4,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{filed5,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update stock set numstr = #{numstr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, innumber = #{innumber,jdbcType=BIGINT}, nownumber = #{nownumber,jdbcType=BIGINT}, flag = #{flag,jdbcType=INTEGER}, `operator` = #{operator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, createtime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, filed1 = #{filed1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, filed2 = #{filed2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, filed3 = #{filed3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, filed4 = #{filed4,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, filed5 = #{filed5,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, numstr, innumber, nownumber, flag, `operator`, createtime, filed1, filed2, filed3, filed4, filed5 from stock where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
